kickstart.description: This defines a generic CentOS machine that will be used as the base image (e.g., stacki-centos.img)
kickstart.post:
if [ '&bootdisk;' == 'sda' ] then BOOTPART=sda1 ROOTPART=sda2 fi
if [ '&bootdisk;' == 'mmcblk0' ] then BOOTPART=mmcblk0p1 ROOTPART=mmcblk0p2 fi
dwc_otg.lpm_enable=0 root=/dev/$ROOTPART rootfstype=ext4 elevator=deadline rootwait
rpm -e httpd
rm -f /etc/yum.repos.d/stacki.repo
sed --in-place -e 's/\$kvariant/rpi2/' \ /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-armhfp-kernel.repo
NETWORKING=yes HOSTNAME=localhost.localdomain
DEVICE=eth0 BOOTPROTO=dhcp ONBOOT=yes MTU=1500
echo "stacki-centos" | passwd root --stdin
/usr/bin/chage -d 0 root
nameserver 8.8.8.8
[Unit] Description=stacki-resizeroot After=network.target Before=systemd-user-sessions.service
[Service] Type=oneshot ExecStart=/tmp/resizeroot.sh RemainAfterExit=no
[Install] WantedBy=multi-user.target
/usr/bin/systemctl enable stacki-resizeroot
echo "#!/bin/sh
if [ ! -f /tmp/resizepart ] ; then echo "STACKI - resizing root partition" > /dev/tty1 /opt/stack/sbin/parted --script /dev/&bootdisk; resizepart 2 100% touch /tmp/resizepart echo "STACKI - rebooting" > /dev/tty1 sleep 5 reboot else echo "STACKI - resizing root filesystem" > /dev/tty1 /usr/sbin/resize2fs /dev/$ROOTPART systemctl disable stacki-resizeroot touch /tmp/resizefs fi " > /tmp/resizeroot.sh
chmod 700 /tmp/resizeroot.sh
